title: Kutsu no Muku Mama
description: "With good shoes, you'll be taken to good places" - With these words taught by her late mother, who was a shoemaker, Ayasumi Yuiya inherits the workshop. With the intention of ensuring that the wearer reaches good places, Yuiya crafts shoes imbued with a little magic. Today, just like every day, her shoes gently envelop someone's steps.
author: Miyabi Akino
